arts.ttl: Bradford come from behind against Chesterfield to make it back-to-back wins

arts.sum: Bradford's 2-1 win over Port Vale on Boxing Day made it three wins in their last four games. Chesterfield's 2-0 defeat to Fleetwood ended four wins on the bounce. Bradford are currently just three p...
